entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Snow level lowering to 1000 metres near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
